title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 370.4 - State master list of agricultural soil groups
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 370.4 - State master list of agricultural soil groups

State Regulations

The master list of agricultural soil groups for New York

State's agricultural land, established and maintained by the department, shall
be a list of New York soil map units placed into soil groups, including any
subdivisions thereof, based on data developed by the National Cooperative Soil

Survey (NCSS) and research data. The master list is established in cooperation
with: U.S.D.A. Soil Conservation Service, Cornell University Agricultural

Experiment Station and the New York State Cooperative Extension Service using
the productivity index system established by section
370.6
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
370.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
